title: SeamlessHR, Payroll and HR Software powers GH¢7bn in salaries across Africa
desc: SeamlessHR, Africa’s leading human resource and payroll technology company, has processed more than GH¢7 billion (over US$600 million) in salaries across the continent in 2025, underscoring the growing scale and trust placed in its payroll and workforce software by organisations operating in African markets. The milestone reflects SeamlessHR’s role in supporting payroll execution, HR operations, […]

title: Poor drainage turns NPE stretch into flood hotspot
desc: A STRETCH of the New Pantai Expressway (NPE) has experienced 17 flood incidents since 2015, with disruptions worsening in recent years.

title: Genesis Invitational: Rory McIlroy finishes one shot behind Genesis winner Jacob Bridgeman
desc: Rory McIlroy shoots a four-under-par 67 but it is not enough to overhaul winner Jacob Bridgeman, who wins by one shot at the Genesis Invitational in Los Angeles.

title: chancellor Scott Bowman resigns amid TAFE accreditation scandal
desc: Charles Darwin University's vice-chancellor Scott Bowman has resigned following an accreditation scandal that has impacted almost 300 of the university's TAFE students.

desc: Reports indicate he has allegedly run out of funds even before the official campaigns begin.
